thread.title: Trump’s New Tweet: Fake News Media ‘Knowingly Doesn’t Tell the Truth’ and It’s a ‘Danger to Our Country’ | Mediaite
thread.title_full: Trump’s New Tweet: Fake News Media ‘Knowingly Doesn’t Tell the Truth’ and It’s a ‘Danger to Our Country’ | Mediaite

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump’s New Tweet: Fake News Media ‘Knowingly Doesn’t Tell the Truth’ and It’s a ‘Danger to Our Country’ | Mediaite
text:
Trump’s New Tweet: Fake News Media ‘Knowingly Doesn’t Tell the Truth’ and It’s a ‘Danger to Our Country’ by Josh Feldman | 10:19 pm, February 24th, 2017 
For the second Friday in a row , President Trump has taken to Twitter to keep his attacks on the “fake news” going. 
This time Trump accused certain news outlets of “knowingly” lying to people and calling that a “great danger to our country”: FAKE NEWS media knowingly doesn't tell the truth. A great danger to our country. The failing @nytimes has become a joke. Likewise @CNN . Sad! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 25, 2017 
Trump said at CPAC earlier today that he doesn’t consider the entire media to be the enemy of the people, just the “fake news.” And CNN and The New York Times , both mentioned above, were kept out of today’s press gaggle . 
[ image via screengrab ]
